text:
I’m having an “inconsistent problem” with understanding if user is a “known user”:
```{% if contact.email %}
show content
{% else %}
show form 
{% endif %}```
I have a Custom Module in which a form is displayed if we cant detect the contact email.  Once the user fills the form it refreshes the page and shows the content. This works for majority of users.

For a small portion of users once the form is filled it never gets passed this if statement. It doesn’t matter how many times the user refreshes the page, it just doesn’t pass it.
